text: "Treehouse of Horror XV" is the first episode of The Simpsons sixteenth season. It is the 15th episode of the Treehouse of Horror series. It was first broadcast on the Fox network on November 7, 2004. The episode has three parts: "The Ned Zone", "Four Beheadings and a Funeral", and "In the Belly of the Boss". == Other websites == * Category:Treehouse of Horror Category:The Simpsons episodes Category:2004 television episodes
title: Treehouse of Horror XV
